titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament,
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the Heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: With royal coat of arms on title page.
Speech discusses general current political situation, mentioning in particular the Popish Plot and current foreign policy.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
